original_text: If any male person among you has not been circumcised, I will not accept him as one of my people. He must become separate from his people. He has not obeyed my covenant.’
korean_text: 할례를 받지 아니한 남자 곧 그 포피를 베지 아니한 자는 백성 중에서 끊어지리니 그가 내 언약을 배반하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: If any male person among you has not been circumcised,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 너희 중에 할례를 받지 않은 남자가 있다면,

sentences.original_text: I will not accept him as one of my people.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 내 백성 중 하나로 받지 않겠다.

sentences.original_text: He must become separate from his people.
He has not obeyed my covenant.'
